officialTitle: Syringe or Continuous Amnioreduction for Symptomatic Polyhydramnios. A Prospective Randomized Study.
inclusionCriteria:
* Pregnant women with abdomen discumfort and ultrasound diagnosis of polyhydramnios (AFI\>25cm)
* Single or twin pregnancies
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 40 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Multiple pregnancy (more than 3 fetuses)
* Maternal history of placental abruptio
* Fetus with IUGR
* Pregnancy complicated with pre-eclampsia
* Unability to give informed consent
